short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: FFLogs speed gamer buttons for shortcutting useful features in a log

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds useful buttons to a FFLogs report for speedrunners. Currently has buttons to reset filters, create filters for LB gen and Boss Targetability, and creates a XIVAnalysis link, etc.
